channel.title: PI Printing out Object ID's

item.title: PI Printing out Object ID's
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

The source Iâ€™m using has it commented out or disabled where should I look for it?

Thanks.

Fixed for people who have the same problem you will have to add this in clickObject.java

import server.util.Misc;

if(c.playerRights == 3 && c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("time")) {
    Misc.println("objectId: "+c.objectId+"  ObjectX: "+c.objectX+ "  objectY: "+c.objectY+" Xoff: "+ (c.getX() - c.objectX)+" Yoff: "+ (c.getY() - c.objectY)); 
   } else if (c.playerRights == 3) {
    c.sendMessage("objectId: " + c.objectId + " objectX: " + c.objectX + " objectY: " + c.objectY);
   }

Read full topic
